title: Kenya Savannah Classic
text:
The Kenya Savannah Classic was a professional <a href="golf">golf</a> tournament that was held 23–26 March 2021 at Karen Country Club in <a href="Nairobi">Nairobi</a>, <a href="Kenya">Kenya</a>. The principal sponsor was <a href="Absa%20Bank%20Limited">Absa Bank Limited</a>.
The tournament was intended to be a one-off event and created a two-week "Kenyan swing" with the <a href="Magical%20Kenya%20Open">Magical Kenya Open</a> being played at the same location the week prior.
<a href="Daniel%20van%20Tonder">Daniel van Tonder</a> defeated <a href="Jazz%20Janewattananond">Jazz Janewattananond</a> in a playoff to claim his first European Tour victory.
